name: Space Smash
description:
This is the first in a series of Arcade games. I want to create small and solid games with simple mechanics, fun and at the lowest possible price for the players, so I created the series of Arcade games. Expect Space Smash to be a small, solid and replayable game. Your only goal is to constantly beat the best score on the board and unlock items, ships and collectibles.

Have fun with the game;
Alysson Moraes - Moraes Studio

 
• You are running out of space! Avoid being crushed by the space storm by collecting blue energy Orbs to gain more time and space, beware of the red Orbs.
• Get the highest score possible! Get to the podium on the scoreboard and try to stay there as long as possible.
• Unlock ships with unique characteristics by collecting coins that appear in the arena.

 
• Inspired by classic Arcade games, Space Smash is a fast, addictive and retro shoot 'em up!
• Steam Achievements and Global Score.
• Easy to learn in Arcade style, using only the keyboard.
• A wide variety of weapons power ups and enemies.
• Steam cloud support.
• Survive how much power to get better score in the classic Arcade style.
• Extremely simplistic graphics.
• Retro sound effects.
